alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Malibu Coast; Palos Verdes Hills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 04 at 3:01AM PDT until November 04 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less at times in dense fog. The dense fog is expected to increase in areal coverage overnight. * WHERE...Malibu Coast, Los Angeles County Beaches, Palos Verdes Hills and Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions. Major roadways that could be impacted by the dense fog include Highway 1 as well as Interstates 10, 105, 405, 110, and 710.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Malibu Coast; Palos Verdes Hills
